article_title: Facing budget shortfall, Tazewell school board proposes $847K in cuts

article_metadata.author:
CHARLIE BOOTHE
Bluefield Daily Telegraph

og.description: TAZEWELL — Tazewell County schools will not see any sports programs cut as a way to save money to handle a projected shortfall for the next fiscal year.
og.title: Facing budget shortfall, Tazewell school board proposes $847K in cuts
